## Hi People üëã I'm Humam

A Software Engineer who finds joy in problem-solving for challenging tasks that create meaningful impact. Currently, working on designing, building, and maintaining Large-scale Backend & Distributed systems @ [Axel Springer NMT](https://www.axelspringer.com/de/). I'm capable of taking ownership of projects and genuinely passionate about every phase of building Software. I hold a Bachelor of Science degree in Software Engineering from CODE University in Berlin.
